nodes.text:
Interconnection Bay Staging: a bright, over-labeled room pretending it’s temporary. (pause)
The AMR reader loop hums with the confidence of something never cross-examined. (pause)
A clipboard station sits under a sign: PLEASE PRINT, as if handwriting is the primary hazard.
Hold up. (pause) Hands off. (pause) I need the work envelope. (pause) Three items. (pause) Put 'em right here. (pause) If its not in the file, (pause) I cant back it.
Okay. IWOs on the sheet. (pause) Slot tokens here. (pause) AMRs issued. (pause) Fine. We stage. (pause) Call it staging and move.

choices.text: ask: It looks like it’s already running.
ask: Show me where you want the AMR.
show: Show the IWO, token, and AMR issuance record.
persuade: You have what you need. Log it and clear me.
